EditTextPreference.android:title: The name of the Map Provider

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show traffic
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When zoomed out of indoor plan should the application display traffic on road in the form of colors?

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show building outlines
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When zoomed out of an indoor map should the application show the building outline?

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display a locating button on top right corner of map screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: The application will automatically snap to where you are on the map if this option is selected, but only when you click the button.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Should the application display a compass on top left of screen
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: A little compass icon will be on the top left corner of the screen in the map screen, it will only show if you rotate the map.
